name: Discover The Nature And Take Wild Shoots
description: Escape from the city, walking in nature and you like to take pictures? Spend the day with us and shoot the best photos in Istanbul: Belgrade Forest.Belgrade forest is under protection and is one of the most visited recreational areas of Istanbul.With a region around 5,500 hectares of forest it houses many plant, bird and animal species and approx 500 species of mushrooms. One of the most popular activities to do in the Belgrade forest besides looking at the beautiful trees and enjoying nature is the fact that you can easily jog and hike through the trails.
